original_text: A priest must not go near to a dead person. It would make him unclean. But if the dead person is his father, his mother, his son, his daughter, his brother or his sister who has not married, he may go near them. It makes him unclean but he may do that.
korean_text: 시체를 가까이 하여 스스로 더럽히지 못할 것이로되 부모나 자녀나 형제나 시집 가지 아니한 자매를 위하여는 더럽힐 수 있으며

sentences.original_text: A priest must not go near to a dead person.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 죽은 사람에게 가까이 가면 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: But if the dead person is his father, his mother, his son, his daughter, his brother or his sister who has not married,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 그 죽은 사람이 그의 아버지, 어머니, 아들, 딸, 남동생이나 결혼하지 않은 여동생이라면,
그는 그들에게 가까이 갈 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: It makes him unclean but he may do that.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 그를 부정하게 만들지만 그는 그렇게 할 수 있습니다.
